page.title: 03PEOPLE AT THE SCHOOL.
page.content:
Mrs COOKE Mrs Cooke is the Head Mistress of Broughton First School. She has got 25 children in her class, and in the whole school there are 200 children. Mrs Cooke likes talking to children. Mrs Cooke does not like filling in forms.
Mrs POWELL. Mrs Powell is the Secretary at Broughton First School. She gets to school at ten minutes to nine. Mrs Powell types and answers the telephone She likes counting the dinner money but not filling in forms.
A TEACHER. Miss Mobey is a teacher at this school.She looks after 28 children in class 3.She wakes up at a quarter to 7 in the morning. She likes singing best
